Package com.lhl.java7.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BehaviorCollectionFactory
    Instantiates a collection of functors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ObservableStateMachine<S>
    A state machine that reacts to state changes by running collections of functors.
    OnEntryAndExitStateMachine<S>
    A StateMachine that runs a Runnable when it enters and leaves its corresponding state.
    OnEntryStateMachine<S>
    A StateMachine that runs a Runnable when it enters its corresponding state.
    OnExitStateMachine<S>
    A StateMachine that runs a Runnable when it leaves its corresponding state.
    PerStateReactingStateMachine<S>
    This state machine stores a Runnable for some of the possible states it can take.
    StateMachine<S>
    This class provide an abstraction for a state machine.
